text:
I want to help create a
world in which a business'

respect for human rights is core
to their license to operate,

I want to encourage
businesses to be

vocal about LGBT rights and
the rights of other minorities

everywhere they operate
around the world.

I'm going to use my
access and my privilege

to open doors for those
who have traditionally
been kept out of these spaces.

I want to be a leader that
lifts up those around me,

and allows them to thrive and
reach their full potential.

And I want to be a friend, a
partner, a son, and a brother

who is always there to provide
support and encouragement
